Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.AlphaNumericText27:
    Corrected method parse(String, ParsePosition) to return the correct index of the next character to parse on successful parsing. Prior to this change the parse(String) method did not throw a ParseException for texts of length 28 and the valueOf(String) method did not throw an IllegalArgumentException for texts of length 28.

  • org.jdtaus.banking.AlphaNumericText27

  • org.jdtaus.banking.Referenznummer10
  • org.jdtaus.banking.Referenznummer11
    • Corrected method parse(String, ParsePosition) to correctly fail parsing illegal letter format values. Prior to this change parsing allowed space characters to appear anywhere in the input string. This change strengthens parsing to disallow space characters to appear at illegal positions.

Updated classes
  • org.jdtaus.banking.Bankleitzahl:
    Added methods isClearingAreaCodeSupported(), isLocalityCodeSupported() and isNetworkCodeSupported() to support instances with fewer than 8 digits. Prior to this change the checkBankleitzahl() method rejected any values with fewer than 8 digits. This version adds support for instances with fewer digits.
